inclusion.criterion: Metastatic cancer that expresses Her-2 at greater than or equal to 2+
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: IHC in the clinical laboratory improvement amendment (CLIA) approved test

inclusion.criterion: Greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to sign a durable power of attorney
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and sign the Informed Consent Document
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical performance status of Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) 0 or 1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of greater than three months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Seronegative for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) antibody
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Seronegative for hepatitis B antigen, and seronegative for hepatitis C antibody
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential who are pregnant or breastfeeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active systemic infections; coagulation disorders or other major medical illnesses of the cardiovascular, respiratory or immune system
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is being treated with Levothyroxine. She has a history of abnormal spotting between menses but no hirsutism or nipple discharge was detected.
